input_text:
Job Title: Patient Care Specialist 2 (Front office Medical Assistant)

Location: Beverly Hills, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Health Care Provider

Description:
Who We Are

 This position requires to travel to our Redondo Beach and/or Long Beach health centers on a as needed basis ** 

 AMAZING INDIVIDUALS WORKING FOR POSITIVE PEOPLE at AIDS Healthcare Foundation! 

Does the idea of doing something that really makes a difference in people’s lives while being well-compensated intrigue you? Are you looking to work for an organization that encourages growth and success from each and every one of its employees?

 If so, AIDS Healthcare Foundation is the place for you! 

Founded in 1987, AIDS Healthcare Foundation is the largest specialized provider of HIV/AIDS medical care in the nation. Our mission is to provide cutting edge medicine and advocacy, regardless of ability to pay. Through our healthcare centers, pharmacies, health plan, research and other activities, AHF provides access to the latest HIV treatments for all who need them.

AHF’s Core Values Are

 Patient-Centered Value Employees Respect for Diversity Nimble Fight for What’s Right

 STILL INTERESTED? Please continue! 

 YOUR CONTRIBUTION TO OUR SUCCESS! 

A Patient Care Specialist 2 (PCS2) contributes to AHF by providing hands-on care to patients under the supervision of registered nurses or physicians and also assist with front office duties. Your contribution as a PCS2 float is essential in providing high-quality and compassionate care to patients, contributing to the overall well-being of individuals and communities. Remember, every small act of care makes a big difference!

A PCS2 enhances the reputation of AHF by providing multifunctional quality patient care and collaborating as a team at assigned Healthcare Centers as directed by the Regional Nursing Director. Providing patient education, accuracy in patient documentation, competency in Nursing Procedures, and leadership support as needed.

You will be a passionate advocate for our top initiatives.

To be successful as a PCS2 it is crucial to ensure that the AHF core Values and Mission stay top of mind with all that your do. At AHF we are nimble and able to adapt in a dynamic environment to assist in providing the best experience for our clients and workplace for our employees.

AHF has a collaborative organizational structure where staff are accountable to multiple leaders.

The PCS2 will work as a part of a close knit team to ensure adherence to protocols.

Licenses/Certifications: Medical Assistant Certification or Medical Assistant Diploma required.

 Want to learn what it's like to be a Patient Care Specialsit 2  at AHF? Watch this quick video: Patient Care Specialist 2: Day in the Life! 

 AHF Commitment 

We at AIDS Healthcare Foundation believe that each individual is entitled to equal employment opportunities without regard to race, color, creed, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status or disability. The right of equal employment opportunity extends to recruiting, hiring selection, transfer, promotion, training and all other conditions of employment. AHF will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the ordinance.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.summary: Contributes to AHF by providing hands-on care to patients under supervision and assisting with front office duties.

Collaborates as a team at assigned Healthcare Centers
output_json.company_information: AIDS Healthcare Foundation is the largest specialized provider of HIV/AIDS medical care in the nation.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Equal employment opportunities without regard to race, color, creed, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status or disability.
